meta.title: Alejandro Canals | Full Stack Developer
meta.description: I am Alejandro Canals, a Full Stack Developer. Passionate about technology and creating modern and efficient web solutions.

home.title: FullStack Developer
home.description: Developer committed to continuous learning and the creation of practical, scalable, and high-quality solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Full-stack developer with experience in PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, SQL, HTML, CSS, and n8n. I have also worked with platforms such as WordPress and PrestaShop.
about.description2: I am currently continuing my training and developing my own projects with modern technologies such as React, Next.js, Node.js, React Native, Python, and Django, with the goal of continuing to grow professionally.

list.title: AlbionTopBuilds
description: PvP build platform for Albion Online with real-time stats powered by the official API. Runs on Docker + Coolify over Ubuntu to automate releases and scale effortlessly.

list.title: Hypnosis Training
description: Custom PHP and JavaScript site that promotes hypnosis courses through guided storytelling. Responsive layout plus focused SEO help capture qualified leads.

list.title: Repair Manager
description: Custom CRM that digitizes repair tickets and assigns technicians from a React + Django dashboard. Automates statuses, notifications, and reports for the whole team.

list.title: Multitask App
description: Web toolbox that downloads videos, removes backgrounds, and merges PDFs in one flow. Flask orchestrates the services to keep the workflow fast and reliable.

list.title: Real Estate Sales
description: Self-managed property catalog with listings, blog, optimized search, and CRM-ready forms. Every lead and follow-up stays centralized from the start.

list.title: Festival Website
description: Festival microsite with schedules, lineup, and ticket sales, built mobile-first with modular SCSS and lightweight JS animations.

list.title: Coffee Blog
description: Coffee-themed WordPress blog designed to publish articles and recipes quickly. Responsive reading experience keeps mobile sessions comfortable.

education.title: Higher Technician in Telecommunications and IT Systems
Courses, Certifications, and Personal Programming Projects

electronics.title: Electronics Repairs
electronics.description1: Besides programming, I have always been passionate about hardware and electronics.
electronics.description2: During my time as a Technician, I worked repairing devices such as mobile phones, tablets, and computers, gaining experience in fault diagnosis, component soldering, and parts replacement.
electronics.description3: During that time, I also carried out various personal projects involving modification and repair of devices, such as mechanical keyboards, consoles, and gadgets.
electronics.description4: Here are some videos of those projects:

cookies.banner_text: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can accept all, reject them, or configure your preferences.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: This website only collects browsing data via Google Analytics without storing personally identifiable information.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Information
section2.content: Collected data is used exclusively to analyze site traffic and improve user experience.

section3.title: 3. Cookies
section3.content: We use analytics cookies to measure website traffic. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time.

section4.title: 4. Contact
section4.content: For questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at alejandrocanals.dev@gmail.com.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small files stored on your device to enhance your browsing experience.

cookies.necessary: Necessary Cookies: Essential for website functionality.
cookies.analytics: Analytics Cookies: We use Google Analytics to measure visits.

section3.title: 3. How to manage cookies?
section3.content: You can manage or reject cookies from our cookie banner or through your browser settings.

section4.title: 4. Contact
section4.content: For more information about our cookie policy, contact us at alejandrocanals.dev@gmail.com
